
---
title: "Provider"
title_tag: "Resource Provider | Package Kong"
meta_desc: "Explore the Provider resource of the Kong package, including examples, input properties, output properties, lookup functions, and supporting types. The provider type for the kong package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration"
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The provider type for the kong package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.



## Create a Provider Resource {#create}

### Inputs

The Provider resource accepts the following [input]({{< prelref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Kong<wbr>Admin<wbr>Password</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}An basic auth password for kong admin
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Kong<wbr>Admin<wbr>Token</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}API key for the kong api (Enterprise Edition)
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Kong<wbr>Admin<wbr>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The address of the kong admin url e.g. http://localhost:8001
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Kong<wbr>Admin<wbr>Username</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}An basic auth user for kong admin
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Kong<wbr>Api<wbr>Key</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}API key for the kong api (if you have locked it down)
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Strict<wbr>Plugins<wbr>Match</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Should plugins `config_json` field strictly match plugin configuration
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Tls<wbr>Skip<wbr>Verify</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether to skip tls verify for https kong api endpoint using self signed or untrusted certs
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

<h2 id="package-details">Package Details</h2>
<dl class="package-details">
	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-kong">https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-kong</a></dd>
	<dt>License</dt>
	<dd>Apache-2.0</dd>
	<dt>Notes</dt>
	<dd>This Pulumi package is based on the [`kong` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/kevholditch/terraform-provider-kong).</dd>
</dl>
